title: How attractive were people during ancient times? - Quora

response.answer_text: Attractive may not be the right word in the sense of beautiful. Ordinary people cared very little for beauty because in survival beauty may take a back seat. But people were physically attractive with respect to strength and health. It was the wealthy people who laid a lot of stress on physical attractiveness. They commissioned paintings so that they could admire the pictures of attractive people and some sought them to marry them.
